easy.q: I go up when the sun rises and come down when it sets. What am I?
easy.hint: It helps you see your shape on the ground.

medium.q: I am a word of letters three; add two, and fewer there will be. What word am I?

hard.q: A box has four corners. Inside is a ball that bounces in a straight line between opposite corners but never touches the sides. What principle explains its path?
hard.hint: Consider how a ball can move if it travels at a 45-degree angle in a square.
